SELECT device.id_pump_house AS phId,/*设备位置id*/ ph.name AS phName, concat(#{prefix},ppi.pump_url) AS phUrl, device.id AS deviceCode,/*设备名牌*/ device.TYPE AS type,
CASE WHEN device.LOCATION = 1 THEN '一区' WHEN device.LOCATION = 2 THEN '二区' WHEN device.LOCATION= 3 THEN '三区' WHEN device.LOCATION= 4 THEN '四区' WHEN device.LOCATION= 5 THEN '五区' ELSE '水泵' END devicePosition FROM device device LEFT JOIN pump_position_set pps ON pps.pump_id = device.id_pump_house LEFT JOIN pump_position_info ppi ON ppi.id = pps.node_id INNER JOIN pump_house ph ON ph.id=device.id_pump_house where device.id_pump_house=#{phId} AND device.del_flag ='0' AND pps.belong_type='0'

SELECT ppi.remote_ctrl_pos AS remoteCtrlPos, ppi.inlet_pos AS inletPos, ppi.outlet_pos AS outletPos, ppi.device_name_pos AS deviceNamePos, ppi.pump_pos AS pumpPos, ppi.tank_pos AS tankPos FROM pump_position_info ppi INNER JOIN pump_position_set pps ON pps.node_id = ppi.id AND pps.pump_id = #{phId} AND pps.belong_type = '0'

SELECT ppi.id AS 'id', ppi.pump_name AS 'pumpName', concat(#{prefix},ppi.pump_url) AS 'pumpUrl', ppi.remote_ctrl_pos AS 'remoteCtrlPos', ppi.inlet_pos AS 'inletPos', ppi.outlet_pos AS 'outletPos', ppi.device_name_pos AS 'deviceNamePos', ppi.pump_pos AS 'pumpPos' FROM pump_position_info ppi LIMIT 1

SELECT pns.node_code AS nodeCode, pns.node_name AS nodeName, pns.node_type AS nodeType, pnp.device_id AS deviceId, pnp.device_location AS deviceLocation, pnp.point_name AS pointName, pnp.point_memo AS pointMemo, pnp.point_unit AS pointUnit FROM pump_node_point pnp INNER JOIN pump_node_set pns ON pns.id = pnp.pump_node_set_id WHERE pnp.pump_house_id = #{phId} AND pnp.point_status = 0 ORDER BY pnp.point_name ASC
SELECT video_no AS videoNo, name AS videoName, hkVideoDeviceId AS monitorIp FROM video_info WHERE pump_house_id = #{phId}

SELECT ds.`name` AS pointName, ds.code AS pointCode, ds.unit AS pointUnit, ds.control_status, CASE f.DATA_TYPE WHEN 'bool' THEN 'bool' WHEN 'word' THEN 'bool' ELSE 'real' END pointType FROM services ds INNER JOIN device device ON device.id = ds.ID_DEVICE AND ds.control_status = '1' AND ds.node_display ='0' AND device.id = #{deviceCode} LEFT JOIN `function` f ON f.`NAME` = ds.`CODE` GROUP BY ds.`name`

SELECT IFNULL(ratio,1) as ratio, s.RangeMaximum AS maxData, s.RangeMinimum AS minData, s.Data_Type as dataType, s.ID_DEVICE as deviceId, s.ID_FUNCTION functionId FROM device device INNER JOIN services s ON s.ID_DEVICE = device.id AND device.id = #{deviceId} AND s.`code` = #{pointCode} LIMIT 1
SELECT GATEWAY_ID as gateWayId , DEVICE_ID as deviceId from gw_device where DEVICE_ID =#{deviceId}
select id as functionId ,data_type as dataType FROM `function` where id =#{functionId}
SELECT * FROM services WHERE node_display = 0 AND control_status = 1 AND ID_DEVICE = #{deviceId} AND CODE = #{code} AND RangeMinimum IS NOT NULL AND RangeMaximum IS NOT NULL

SELECT temp.date_time dateTime FROM (SELECT temp1.id_device,temp1.id_service, temp1.tag_name, temp1.pv, DATE_FORMAT(temp1.date_time, '%Y-%m-%d %h') date_time FROM (SELECT id_device,id_service, tag_name,pv,date_time FROM ${tableName} where TAG_NAME='总进水压力' or TAG_NAME='进水压力下限' ) temp1 ) temp LEFT JOIN services s ON s.id = temp.id_service where s.code in ('pressure_szjs1','pressure_szjs2','pressurein_lowset') GROUP BY temp.date_time,s.code

SELECT temp.id_device idDevice,temp.id_service idService, s.name, tag_name tagName, s.unit, sum(temp.pv * case when ratio is null then 1 else ratio end) as pv, s.code,temp.date_time dateTime,count(*) num FROM (SELECT temp1.id_device,temp1.id_service, temp1.tag_name, temp1.pv, DATE_FORMAT(temp1.date_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H') date_time FROM (SELECT id_device,id_service, tag_name,pv,date_time FROM ${tableName} where TAG_NAME='总进水压力' or TAG_NAME='进水压力下限' ) temp1 ) temp left JOIN services s ON s.id = temp.id_service where s.code in ('pressure_szjs1','pressure_szjs2','pressurein_lowset') GROUP BY temp.date_time,s.code

select p.`NAME` pumpName from service_values_current temp2 LEFT JOIN device d on d.id=temp2.id_device LEFT JOIN pump_house p on p.id=d.ID_PUMP_HOUSE where temp2.FUNCTION_MEMO in ('总进水压力','进水压力下限') group by p.`NAME`

select temp2.pv,p.`NAME` pumpName,s.code from service_values_current temp2 LEFT JOIN device d on d.id=temp2.id_device LEFT JOIN pump_house p on p.id=d.ID_PUMP_HOUSE left JOIN services s ON s.id = temp2.id_service where temp2.FUNCTION_MEMO in ('总进水压力','进水压力下限') and p.`NAME`= #{pName}
